file_insights.changes_summary: Added chrono-node validation to prevent AI hallucinations in temporal event extraction

patterns_discovered: Multi-layered validation strategy for AI-extracted dates
Using external library (chrono-node) to cross-validate AI extraction
Flexible date matching with tolerance for text and position
gotchas_discovered: AI can hallucinate dates not present in source text
Some date formats might be missed by chrono-node
Relative dates require special handling in validation
recommendations: Consider machine learning approaches for more sophisticated hallucination detection
Implement unit tests for validation edge cases
